itunes:title: Episode 089: Tabitha Smith (feat. Leah Williams)
title: Episode 089: Tabitha Smith (feat. Leah Williams)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 89 of CEREBRO, Connor and Marvel writer Leah Williams (X-Factor, X-Men: The Trial of Magneto, X-Terminators) toast to Tabitha Smith, the bodacious Boom-Boom! Created by Jim Shooter and Al Milgrom, explosive street kid Tabby quickly became a mainstay of the X-Men franchise, most notably with a long run on X-Force in the 90s.

The CEREBRO character file on Boom-Boom begins at 1:32:45.

(Content Advisory: Tabitha's story includes child abuse, domestic violence, survival sex work, suicidal ideation, threats of sexual violence, and substance abuse.)

You can support CEREBRO on Patreon!



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
